Proposals which seek to provide CIL-in-kind in exchange for the delivery of strategic infrastructure are required to: a. provide robust justification for CIL-in-kind in comparison to contributions towards strategic infrastructure; b. set out in detail the proposed type of infrastructure which would qualify as CIL-in-kind; and c. engage early in the development process with the council’s infrastructure planning team.
